game.minigame

Class GuessTheNumber

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.minigame.Minigame<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer,GuessTheNumberAnswer>
      • game.minigame.GuessTheNumber
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GuessTheNumber
extends Minigame<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer,GuessTheNumberAnswer>
    Implements the Guess The Number between 1 - 10 (mini)game as listed in section 3.4 of the specification
    Version:
    1.0, 2.0 Added exception Error if doTurn() is called on a game that has already finished Added isolated tests in main()
    Author:
    jesse, jesse
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
